dplyr across internals

Source: R/across.R
dplyr_across_internals.Rd

the following functions were taken verbatim from the dplyr package such that behaviors of across() were consistent between dplyr and biocmask

Usage

expr_substitute(expr, old, new)

node_walk_replace(node, old, new)

as_across_expr(fn, var)

is_inlinable_lambda(x)

validate_fns(quo, mask, error_call = caller_env())

is_inlinable_function(x)

is_inlinable_formula(x)

Developed by Justin Landis, Michael Love.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.0.
